query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `email_settings` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `logoUrl` text,
  `primaryColor` varchar(7) NOT NULL DEFAULT '#667eea',
  `accentColor` varchar(7) NOT NULL DEFAULT '#764ba2',
  `footerText` text NOT NULL,
  `companyName` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'EdKonnect Academy',
  `supportEmail` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'support@edkonnect.com',
  `updatedBy` int,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (`updatedBy`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL
);

INSERT INTO `email_settings` (`footerText`) VALUES ('EdKonnect Academy - Connecting Students with Expert Tutors');
